paper_title: ethnography in Contemporary Context: A Cross-Disciplinary Analysis
feedback:
Evaluation from Professor Dr. Margaret Williams, Literature

STRENGTHS:
• Excellent research scope and comprehensiveness
• Outstanding cross-disciplinary analysis
• Thorough development of ideas with appropriate depth
• Excellent prose style and argumentation

AREAS FOR IMPROVEMENT:
• Develop more original insights and innovative connections

SPECIFIC COMMENTS:
This paper demonstrates Maya Garcia's engagement with the LibraryOfBabel research system and shows 
adequate 
understanding of interdisciplinary research methods.

The use of AI-assisted literature discovery is competent but could be more creative. 
The cross-disciplinary analysis successfully bridges multiple academic domains.

Continue developing your analytical skills and consider how technology can enhance rather than replace critical thinking.

Overall, this represents strong 
work for a Anthropology student in Cultural Anthropology.
